page.title: 07BIOGRAPHY:PAT MACDONALD.
page.content: Pat MacDonald can trace his family in Glenmoriston to the time of his Great-grandfather who was known as Donald the Carrier from his occupation of delivering goods by horse and cart. Pat's family has always been involved in transport-related business,repair and servicing vehicles,taxi-hire including conveyance of schoolchildren and funeral-directing.He is a fund of information on the history of Glen- moriston,and takes an active part in all community affairs. A patriarchal figure,he is a Justice of the Peace, Community Councillor and chairman of various committees.He sees the advent of T.V.as one of the major changes in Glen life.Peopleare less inclined to attend functions in the village hall. He regrets the recent loss of many amenities but enjoys life here though hisfamily will seek careers else where
